issue.title: Apply changes to physics parameters to GUI instantaneously

content.raw: The GUI currently receives physics parameters via a [physics_info request/response](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/d6c6e3d6048edca82d6fce6aaff65c59b4b98bcc/gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc#cl-184). This would probably need to be changed to publish/subscribe? Or maybe the GUI needs to listen to the `~/physics topic`, and whenever a message is published there (that wasn't published by the gui itself), it could trigger a new `physics_info` request?
content.html: The GUI currently receives physics parameters via a physics_info request/response. This would probably need to be changed to publish/subscribe?
